review_data.title: One of my favorites for years - best Sushi in town
review_data.content: Love this place inside and outside (cute little garden). The sushi and various dishes are wonderful, always adding new creations, best quality and great service. One of my very favorites for lunch. Always a sure bet.

review_data.title: The original and the best of all the yoojis in town
review_data.content: This is the original Yooji’s, still the best in my opinion out of all the additional Yooji’s restaurants they opened subsequently. It is not fancy sushi, nothing too creative. But if you want quality sushi at a reasonable price, you can get it here.
